The picture was originally posted on Fac: 2. Nigerian authorities have indeed seized weapons in the past, including a significant arsenal found in Lagos in 2010, as reported by AFP.
Through a Google image search: it was discovered that the guns in the picture were not found in Nigeria. Many visually similar photos of piles of weapons were found, leading to the conclusion that the picture was not taken in Nigeria.
The picture was traced back to its origi: which was a Getty image taken by David McNew in the US State of California. The full caption of the image indicates that the guns were confiscated by the Los Angeles County Sheriffs Department and destroyed in California.
